casebody.data:
I.B.
v.
OLENTANGY LOCAL SCHOOL DIST. BD. OF EDN. 2017-1160 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 8, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

Certified Question of State Law, United States District Court, Southern District of Ohio, Eastern Division, No. 2:16-CV-837. On Cleveland Municipal School District Board of Education's motion for leave to intervene as petitioner. Motion denied.

O'Donnell, Fischer, and DeGenaro, JJ., dissent.
